description:
Building Enabling Governance and Institutions 
for Earthquake Response

subproject.corporate outcome: 1. National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services and support conflict reduction2.Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
To enable local government institutions to function again quickly and have technical capacities to plan and implement disaster response activities through a transparent, equitable and participatory process.

Capacity of local government official, elected representatives and GNOs developed so that they can play an effective role in coordination, planning and monitoring disaster response
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: (CPRU) BEGIN-ER

title: Building Enabling Governance and Institutions
